title: Devyani, PVR Inox form JV to develop food courts in malls
description: Devyani International has formed a 51:49 joint venture with multiplex operator PVR Inox to develop and operate food courts within shopping malls in India. The companies have no consideration exchanged and will invest in the proposed company's share capital in a 51:49 ratio. Existing food court businesses will not be part of the proposed company's business until the expiry, termination, or renewal of contracts.
